name: Melonius Thunk
description: A melon combo - lots of iterations landed me here.  Flavor profile is strong on the honeydew.  Added cantaloupe for depth, pear for a bit of a boost, watermelon for sweetness, and marshmallow for the mouthfeel and sugar boost.
author: zwermp

reviews.text: I tried this first as written, but TPA pear literally makes me feel ill.  So I tried it again with FA pear subbed in, which doesn't change the flavor profile much but does remove that nauseous feeling I get from the TPA.  Works really well and really emphasizes the melon.  Good summertime vape.

Some of my favorite flavors that I never thought to use together in a mix. I'm surprised it's balanced so well considering my main concern was whether the watermelon would play well with the honeydew. I'm getting the cantaloupe/honeydew on the inhale and watermelon on the exhale, with a light but satisfying taste of pear throughout. Very nice recipe, man. I didn't even finish 5 mLs of it before I mixed it up in a much larger bottle.
